name: PSILCA Data Quality System
description: Data quality system for the PSICLA database.

scores.description: Single data point / completeness unknown
Complete data for country-specific sector / country
Non-representative selection, low bias
Representative selection of country-specific sector / country
Non-representative selection, unknown bias
Country with similar conditions or average of countries with slightly different conditions
Average of countries with different conditions, geography under study included, with small share; or not included
Data from unknown or distinctly different regions
Data from same geography (country)
Average of countries with different conditions, geography under study included, with large share; or country with slightly different conditions
Non-verified data partly based on assumptions or data from non-recognized sources
Statistical study, or verified data from primary data collection from several sources
Non-qualified estimate or unknown origin
Verified data from primary data collection from one single source or non-verified data from primary sources , or data from recognized secondary sources
Qualified estimate (e.g. by expert)
Less than 3 years of difference to the time period of the dataset
Less than 5 years of difference to the time period of the dataset
Less than 1 year of difference to the time period of the dataset
Age of data unknown or data with more than 5 years of difference to the time period of the dataset
Less than 2 years of difference to the time period of the dataset
Data from similar sector, e.g. within the same sector hierarchy; or average of sectors with similar technology
Average of different sectors, sector under study included, with small share; or not included
Data from same technology (sector)
Data with unknown technology / sector or from distinctly different sector
Data from slightly different sector, or average of different sectors, sector under study included, with large share
